actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide for free mailing privileges for members of the Armed Forces serving in the Persian Gulf region as part of Operation Desert Shield.

summary.text: Grants free mailing privileges to members of the armed forces serving in the Persian Gulf region as part of Operation Desert Shield (or any other military operation resulting from the invasion of Kuwait by Iraq). Provides for reimbursement of the Postal Service from Department of Defense appropriations for matters sent in the mails under such authority.

titles.title: To provide for free mailing privileges for members of the Armed Forces serving in the Persian Gulf region as part of Operation Desert Shield.
